question: HELP PERIOD PANICING!!!!!!!!!?
question_content: IS THERE ANYTHING WRONG WITH ME I STARTED MY PERIOD IN THE POOL IS THAT NORMAL? I HAVE A HEAVY FLOW LIKE I WENT THREW 5 TAMPONS TODAY WHEN MY TEACHER GAMVE THEM TO ME I WENT THREW 5 ION A HOUR? any thing wrong i am scareed please jhelp?

answers.answer_content:
its totally normal, your period can be heavy or light,....your tampon may not be as full as you thought maybe it was but having a heavy period is common, what you should do is go to the doctor or women's health clinic and talk to someone there and they will be able to help you relax a bit and give you all the  information you need,
all the best

Doesn't matter that you started your period in a pool. 


However, if you seriously soaked through 5 tampons in an hour, I'd suggest you see a gynecologist. That's not just heavy flow, that's extreme. 5 tampons in a DAY is normal, but not in an hour. You've confused me a bit, because you said two different things.

okay relax relax relax sheesh!
its not biggie some people just have a heavy flow
yes since you just got it expect the next 2 years to be filled with fluctuating periods and flows and lengths and stuff will not be consistent

but no worries just use a tampon and youll be fine
buuuuuuut you might wanna talk to your mom or a doctor because they can put you on birth control to help you with that, i know plenty of girls and women that have/had to do that.
that is NOT normal at all to go through 5 tampons in an hour!  You need a doctor ASAP, especially if it is still that strong!

no there is nothing wrong
since you are still in your first 1o years of it [i am asuming] 
it will be heavey and then light
it will flucuate and you know.
its normal completley. if its bothering you
tell your doctor. theyll give you birthcontrols
that help make it lighter
i know cuz its happened to me : )
birth control helps
BUT if your having more probs with the birth control
tell the doc.
I suggest going to the doctor. I woudn't take medical advice from a stranger.
i take it this was your first time, relax and talk to someone you will be fine periods tend to be different in everyone sometimes they even get out of whack for one reason or the other .
